general.name: Abdessalam Dakhissi
general.headline: Full-Stack Engineer & Systems Architect
general.status: Open to relocation and on-site roles
about: I'm Abdessalam, a full-stack engineer and systems architect delivering production-grade software independentlyâ€”from concept and UX to backend, DevOps, and AI integration.

Currently pursuing dual Master's degrees in Software Engineering and Information Systems Management while leading engineering at P2SLINK, where I deliver SaaS platforms across WMS, NMS, medical systems, and AI automation.
I'm passionate about building software that makes a real difference and solving complex technical challenges. Fluent in Arabic, English, and French.
general.summary: Full-stack engineer and systems architect delivering production-grade software independentlyâ€”from concept and UX to backend, DevOps, and AI integration. Currently pursuing dual Master's degrees in Software Engineering and Information Systems Management. Solo engineering lead at P2SLINK, delivering SaaS platforms across WMS, NMS, medical systems, and AI automation.

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer / Systems Architect
experiences.description: Sole developer for full software stack across multiple SaaS platforms. Built WMS in Laravel + Docker Compose with monitoring via Prometheus/Grafana. Developed TR-069 auto-config server using Spring Boot & ActiveMQ. Created SNMP-based network dashboard using React + Spring Boot. Built medical app with Django + React + JWT + RabbitMQ. Integrated AI assistant using LangChain/OpenAI for ticket triage. Led interns and planned 2-week Scrum sprints with CI/CD automation via GitHub Actions.

experiences.title: Network Support Specialist
experiences.description: Monitored client networks and responded to incidents under strict SLAs via ServiceNow. Delivered high-level B2B technical support ensuring optimal network performance and reliability.

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Developed a full-stack web application for a client in France, delivering end-to-end solutions with modern web technologies.

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Collaborated on developing a Warehouse Management System (WMS) for a major client in Africa, contributing to team-based enterprise solution development.

projects.name: Web-Based Flight Simulator
projects.description: Advanced flight dynamics simulation with PS4 controller input and 2D/3D mapping visualization. Ongoing project showcasing complex real-time systems integration.

projects.name: Network Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive SNMP-based network monitoring system with modular architecture. Features real-time device monitoring, alert management, and performance analytics dashboard.

projects.name: AI-Powered Bug Tracker
projects.description: Intelligent bug tracking system with NLP-powered classification and automated priority assignment. Features AI-assisted ticket triage and performance benchmarking.

projects.name: AI Project Manager
projects.description: Proof-of-concept application that generates automated task breakdowns and project updates using advanced AI agents and workflow automation.

projects.name: Medical AI Assistant
projects.description: AI-powered medical consultation platform with appointment booking, symptom analysis, and doctor recommendations. Built with robust messaging architecture.

projects.name: Warehouse Management System
projects.description: Enterprise-grade WMS with real-time inventory tracking, automated workflows, and comprehensive monitoring via Prometheus and Grafana.
